channel.title: OptimusX, Thriving For Perfection [317] [Website Developer]
channel.description: Information: We Are Currently In Need Of A Website Developer. There Are A Few Things That We Just Cant Do And Need Another Staff. You Will Have A Test To Prove That You Are Good Enough For The OptimusX Team Your Test Is To Make A Vote4Cash [correctly] And Link Everything And Make Sure That If People Vote, You Get The Cash. We Are Running Off A Server That Is Made From Scratch But Is Similar To PI The Website Is At www.optimusx.net If You Would Like To Apply Contact Me Here [comment] Or On Skype: "soda432" Or "ben.nayback"

item.title: OptimusX, Thriving For Perfection [317] [Website Developer]
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

LOOOL, ima quit spamming your thread, last post lol, i don’t have time for immature kid’s like you. IPB is payed with a license you idiot. Those forum’s are IPB, why don’t you learn what forums are. I don’t host my server’s i thought i was going to, but im just more like a program and release. You don’t even know what an array or a boolean is probally… so gtfo.

item.title: OptimusX, Thriving For Perfection [317] [Website Developer]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Though you have a copied name. I would love to help you.
But as stated above. You need a little more info then “make a vote4cash” I can do that in 10 minutes flat.

  1. Is it a PI or Delta?
  2. Do you have remote MySQL connectivity? (if you don’t know, tell me your web host and I can tell you).
  3. How do we know that you aren’t just using this to get a free vote4cash and when they make it for you, you won’t just bail?
  4. Here is my proof I’m a good web dev:
    Site 1 Site 2
    I run both sites. One is down (site 1) because I have no use for it.
    If you honestly want the name and domain. I’ll gladly sell it to you (not on these forums that’s against rules).
  5. You realize Web dev;s need 100% access to the website at any given time, right?
  6. If you want vote for cash they also need access to your server.

Read full topic
